partial_overlap.description: Character partially overlapped by another character or object
partial_overlap.strategy: Use character-specific body part prompts to fill missing regions

background_occlusion.strategy: Infer occluded parts from visible body structure and character identity

edge_transparency.description: Semi-transparent edges from anti-aliasing or DoF blur
edge_transparency.strategy: Use soft edge prompts, minimal inpainting

character_classification.description: Automatically detect which character is in the instance using CLIP

body_part_detection.description: Detect which body part is occluded using pose keypoints
